level.text: In accordance with §11 of the Act [§36-310, D.C. Code, 1981 ed.] and §2(1) of the Act [§36-301(12), D.C. Code, 1981 ed.], the employer with the last known exposure shall be liable to pay compensation for occupational disease.
The employer shall not be liable for any occupational disease which results from a hazard to which the worker has had greater exposure outside of the employment.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 3213 (June 3, 1994).
